mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.perms FROM permission p INNER JOIN role_permission rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_role ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND p.status = 1 AND p.perms IS NOT NULL AND p.perms != ''
SELECT DISTINCT r.role_key FROM role r INNER JOIN user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND r.role_status = 1
